page.title: 08LAMPORT HALL Kitchens
page.content:
We went into the kitchens which were very big and up the servants stairs(50 steps)because servants were not allowed up the front stairs and they had to carry coal and hot water upstairs and they had to carry chamber pots down, just think what would happen if you fell.There aren't servants now and everybody has bathrooms and central heating so you don't need servants to carry everything. There are lots of interesting things to see at Lamport. There is a badger set in one of the woods.We didn't see any badgers but we knew they were there because we found droppings near a hole.
Lamport Hall is open to the public on Sundays and Bank Holidays.
